page.title: 18GOATS & CHICKENS,FENSTANTON
page.content:
We went to a house along{Hilton {Road,Fenstanton.}A lady called {Mrs Balaam}has about 800 chickens . The chickens are{Brown Warrens. She gets about{800}to a{1000}eggs a day and sells them at her door and at shops. When we went we saw buckets and buckets of eggs and in a shed there were lots of shelves of them.
I have{2 goats}both females,a mother and daughter. When the daughter had stopped drinking the mothers milk we tried to milk her,failing every time ,so now we don't try to get milk from her.They need cleaning out once a week in the winter and once every two weeks in the summer.We feed them oat- meal along with peelings and scraps of all kinds.Their names are{BIG BERTHA} and {LITTLE BERTHA.(By Neil Camp and {Joseph Turner,11years)
